body_html: @SsnL @zou3519 while I agree that the gradient at the boundaries is not well defined, I think that it might be worth considering letting the gradient at the boundaries be 1 instead of zero. This seems to also follow the convention of TF, and I don't really think that people used to rely on this behavior of the derivative of clamp, so it wouldn't be a breaking change
